item.title: Link: This is Linus
item.description: Last week Zite suggested this article, I’ve known about Linus and his rude comments. But reading this article, I realised that being polite is not right solution for everything. Having the experience of working with the many developers over the years, I met only very few people who act on subtle comments I pass during discussion about code/best practices. The rest just ignore and do what they have always been doing.
